# OCD  

Concordance Rates: 63-87%  
Brain functions: abnormal activity in the frontostriatal circuits, increased gray matter in the basal ganglia, reduced gray matter in the cingulate cortices. The most severe cases occur with lower serotonin levels.  
Treatment: Antidepressants and SSRIs; cognitive behavioral therapy
